comments.author: Betwrong
comments.body: Hello Mike,welcome to the forum! Endorphina is a known slot provider to me and, I think, to many people on this forum, so it's nice to have an Official Representative of Endorphina here on bitcointalk.Here's my question, to start up a conversation, I guess. As I see, most, if not all, Endorphina slots have RTP of 96%, and my question is, is it changing over time? I mean, are there some periods of time for some slots when their RTP is much higher for promotional reasons, and if yes, are there announcements in advance about that?

comments.author: ENDORPHINA
comments.body: Hello @betwrong  how are you, my friend?  and thanks! All the slots are with 96% RTP and they don't change with the promos or with the casinos .. so forever 96%

comments.body: We cannot say which one is the best provider and surely Endorphina is not in the top list of the online casinos compared to Hacksaw gaming,Pragmatic Play,Play n Go,No limit City and Relax Gaming,both the names I have mentioned here are rated much but much higher than Endorphina from many gamblers and not only gamblers but also gamblers/streamers.You need to improve a lot in order to compete with the big names,I have been a gambler since long ago and I know Endorphina was once one among the best but that has changed dramatically,no offense meant here only stating some facts.

I just wanted to ask are there any rewards for new users?, such as a first deposit bonus. Because it really attracts the attention of potential new users, like me for example.Endorphina is just a slot provider and deposit bonus is responsibility of the casino since casino is just using there software in there website and the bonuses such as deposit bonuses that you are asking is the casino responsibility. You can ask them question about there slots such as bug, functionality or your experience and not things that related on the casino feature.I’m surprised that endorphina starts there ANN thread which makes forum member life easier in case they have problem on there slot games. Dealing provider issue is very before since players can’t communicate directly to provider which always result to a very long process of waiting.

comments.author: ENDORPHINA
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on October 11, 2022, 01:43:14 PMHello Endorphina, nice service, i just test some of your games and i like the user interface. And now i have some questions:How can we know the games are provably fair?Is there a way for us to verify each roll?Does the RTP involve the betting amount?Hello my friend!  good question, We have the GLI Certification (Gaming Laboratories International) and RNG  ( Random Number Generator) Certificate to prove that the slots are fair, The first contact to verify each roll or spin will be with the casino, and the RTP is always de same 96%, never change
